title: Calories in 16 oz Ribeye Steak
meta_description: Discover calories in ribeye steak 16 oz, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per 100 g basis, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: Boneless ribeye steak, choice grade, grilled to medium, trimmed to 0" fat, no added sauces or marinades.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, grade, cooking method, fat trimming, and portion accuracy. Check labels or use a food scale for precision.

quick_answer.text: A 16 oz grilled ribeye steak provides ~1320 kcal and ~109 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp butter for basting per 100 g
Fully trimmed of visible fat (vs. 0" trim) per 100 g
Pan-seared with 1 tsp oil per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in a 16 oz ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 1320 kcal for a grilled, choice-grade ribeye.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 16 oz ribeye steak?
faqs.a: About 109 g of protein, making it a high-protein option.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”grilling retains more moisture; frying adds fat and calories.

faqs.q: How much fat is in 16 oz ribeye?
faqs.a: Around 100 g total fat, including 43 g saturated.

faqs.q: Are these values for raw or cooked ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Cooked (grilled); raw is lower in calories per weight due to water loss during cooking.
